<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Purifying Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2979) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 200 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[wave order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

You purify the water within a creature's body to cleanse them of illness. If the next action you use is to cast [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) targeting a single living creature, you can attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) a [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) or [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) affecting the target, in addition to the other benefits of _heal_. If you do, _heal_ gains the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait.
name: Purifying Spell
